modShortDescription: Alters everyone's movement speed based on the type of terrain you are on. From -25% for snow up to +35% for Asphalt. It also affects zombies.
modDescription:
Alters everyone’s movement speed based on the type of terrain you are on. From -25% for snow up to +35% for Asphalt. It also affects zombies and Elucidus think it still doesn’t work for vehicles.

**[Download](https://cdgroup.org/files/7dtd/TerrainBasedMovementSpeed.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25810-a20-modlets-30k-stacks-arrow-xbow-ammo-swap-ammo-disassemble/).

**Credits:** [Elucidus](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/elucidus/)
